events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and are excited to review your credentials.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering due to your background in software development and coding experience.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your case and will be your point of contact throughout the hiring process.
Your initial screening interview focusing on your software engineering skills went well, and you demonstrated solid knowledge.
Thank you for your prompt response and confirming your availability for the upcoming technical interview next week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled with the senior engineering team for April 10th at 10 AM UTC.
You successfully completed the technical interview, impressing the panel with your problem-solving abilities and coding skills.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for April 14th at 3 PM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
You completed the HR interview with positive feedback given regarding your alignment with company values and team fit.
An employment offer has been proposed to you for the Software Engineer position, including salary and benefits details.
You have provided positive feedback on the employment terms and expressed enthusiasm about joining the engineering team.
You have formally accepted the offer, and we are excited to welcome you aboard as a new member of our engineering department.
Your onboarding process has officially started, and you have been provided access to all necessary development tools and documentation.
The hiring process is now complete, and your position as a Software Engineer has been successfully finalized.
